mathstein module
****************

mathstein.MultiVarSolver(equations, n)

mathstein.OneVarSolver(lin_equation)

mathstein.accessory_cubic(A, B, C, D, x)

mathstein.coeffgen(eqn, degree)

mathstein.cubicsolver(coeff)

mathstein.get_index(d, c)

mathstein.graphgen(coeff)

mathstein.quadraticsolver(coeff)
